subject: Motivated letter
content: Don't worry, it's not a spam, you may trust me and open the attachment.
letterText: Dear Nastassia, I want motivate and encourage you. By learning Cypress, you'll quit your current project and open up new opportunities in your career. Stay motivated and embrace the challenges along the way. Believe in yourself and trust the process! Everything will be great, I promise you. Best regards, Your Cypress
